Race.SpecificTitle: PW Library Tax Renewal -- 2.91 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Lafayette, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of two and ninety-one hundredths (2.91) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $6,060,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of the maintenance and support of the public library of Lafayette Parish and its branches?
